attributes.action: Limit the number of 'migrant workers' allowed permant entry  to the UK to the number of available houses!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The housing crisis is being affected by vast numbers of immigrants & there  should be housing available confirmed before allowing permanent entry ONLY after housing all current british citzens who are on waiting lists for years & being passed over for new arrivals> The creation of all the new 'affordable housing' are future ghettos! After all most of the 60's built housing is being scrapped as unsociable, in degenerated areas that create crime and moral decline- why make the same mistakes!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
